name: Binapet
description: Binapet ecosystem is the perfect combination of NFT gaming and DeFi that enables users to have fun and earn profit simultaneously. The comprehensive ecosystem comprises Binapet RPG game, Farming , NFT Marketplace and Battle. More than a game, Binapet also has a strong community helping players on investing activites to earn money from game. In luck pets the users will be able to build as many pets as they would like, each pet has a persona which will start in an animal shelter and build up from there, eventually going on to becoming adopted and growing up.
